dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is used to assess patients with stroke remotely The extent of training necessary to use these systems is unknown A site independent telemedicine system used in the STRokE DOC trial is reliable when used by telemedicine trained investigators We report a prospective evaluation of telemedicine s reliability when used by nontelemedicine trained examiners
Journal of stroke and cerebrovascular diseases : the official journal of National Stroke Association
Reliability of site-independent telemedicine when assessed by telemedicine-naive stroke practitioners.
